title: ReS1:K
text: Apply verbal and non-verbal communication and listening skills to interact with others, form and maintain positive relationships, and resolve conflict constructively. (Communication)
subject: Social-Emotional Learning
subs: I can be considerate of others by taking turns, sharing; and using compliments to encourage others.
I can name the actions of an active listener.
I can recognize when I can solve a problem on my own or when I need adult support.
I can identify situations that are unkind or unfair.
